column13:
Zelo Keratin Shampoo - Imported (236 ml) Price: Rs.2900

Zelo Keratin Shampoo Salt & Sulfate Free 8 fl oz (236 ml). This salt and sulfate free shampoo is formulated with rich proteins and concentrated keratin to delicately cleanse the hair. Regular use helps to retain keratin and hair color. Free of harsh and drying additives like salt and sulfates Zelo is a luxurious shampoo that gently cleanses the hair while preserving and promoting moisture with a blend of muru-muru seed butter cupuacu and babassu butter mica minerals and other natural ingredients found in the Amazon. Recommended for: Colored bleached or keratin treated hair. 1-800-890-8893. Made in USA
